reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress expensive-looking, well-made, and comfortable, with a flattering cut that accentuates their figure. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it great, others say it's too short. The material quality is also mixed, with some praising the fabric while others find it thin and similar to SHEIN quality. While some it's not see-through, others find it revealing. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must in your wardrobe!
items.body: I recently purchased this black dress, and I must say, it's a stunning addition to my wardrobe! Being 5'0" and around 146lbs, I initially ordered a medium, but it felt a bit too snug. I exchanged it for a large, and it fits perfectly, giving me a comfortable yet flattering silhouette. The quality of the fabric is excellent, it’s stretchy, breathable and the dress drapes beautifully. It's versatile enough for fancy dinners or special occasions. The dress is a bit pricey, but the quality and fit make it worth the investment. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a timeless and elegant piece! Read more
items.author: diana mondragon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress nice fabric
items.body: Very flattering. Looks more expensive than it is. Love the fabric Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very cute!
items.body: fits true to size, very comfortable and flattering! slightly see through so keep that in mind if you’ll be wearing during the daytime Read more
items.author: Maggie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fall dress!
items.body: I wore this dress for a fall themed photoshoot, and it’s thin but it’s not see through!! So so cute on and stretchy! The color is spot on to the picture and the length is pretty good for long torsos, I’m 5’10 btw! Read more
items.author: Sarah Jane Mobley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long sleeve dress
items.body: I got this beautiful dress for the fall. I got my first one in black and another one green. It looks very pretty very casual but at the same time a little bit elegant. Great material is exactly how it looks in the picture. Read more
items.author: Vilmary Rosario

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for any occasion
items.body: Great dress for any occasion I am 5’6 and it is a bit short and depending on color could be see through overall great quality and fit true to size Read more
items.author: jackie22

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A pretty dress
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous—the fit is flattering and the fabric feels high quality The only thing to be aware of is that the V-neck is much lower than I expected. I definitely plan on sewing it higher before wearing it. If you’re okay with a deep neckline, it’s a beautiful LBD. Otherwise, just be prepared! Read more
items.author: Jeana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light weight little black dress
items.body: I absolutely loved the look and feel of this dress. I have thicker upper arms and was worried the sleeves would be too tight but it was perfect. I wore this dress for an early evening outdoor event. It was close to 80 before the sun lowered, but the fabric was light enough that I was not hot. When the sun set, the sleeves kept me warm enough in the cooler air. The deep v-neck was flattering in contrast to the long covered up sleeves. The skirt has a thicker layer of fabric along the hem line which added some weight to prevent it from being too light in the breeze. My only issue is the fabric was very difficult to get the deep creases from the air tight packaging out of the dress completely. Read more
items.author: Kika G.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Orange, Rose Red, Light Pink, Light Purple, Blue, Burgundy, Chocolate, Sage Green, Light Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
